links.title: JPMorgan thinks the electric vehicle revolution will create a lot of losers
links.description: Adoption of electric vehicles is set to accelerate, and that's going to run over a lot of losers, including within the auto industry itself, JPMorgan Cazenove said in a note on Monday. The shift toward electric vehicles is set to be a multi-year process, but once there's a tipping point, likely on a shift in costs, the transition could take off, JPMorgan analysts said.

messages.body: Tesla Stock Could Head Lower In The Near Term $TSLA https://amigobulls.com/articles/2017-08-22-tesla-stock-could-head-lower-in-the-near-term

links.title: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) Stock Could Head Lower In The Near Term | Amigobulls
links.description: Shares of Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) have had a rough time over the last couple of months. In what was undoubtedly a great start to the year, Tesla shares had risen by close to 80% in the calendar year, as of June 23rd. They have, however, declined by nearly 13% since.

$TSLA Tesla won't enter the Indian market for another year, but it'll find a captive audience there when it does… https://stocknews.com/news/tsla-india-remains-a-big-potential-growth-driver-for-tesla-inc/

links.title: India Remains A Big Potential Growth Driver For Tesla Inc (TSLA)
links.description: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) has slowly but surely expanded its reach beyond U.S. borders over the past couple of years. But one market it still has yet to enter is India. The fast-growing emerging market is the third largest auto market in the world, and electric vehicles (EVs) are being adopted there at a startling rate.

messages.body: $TSLA https://finance.yahoo.com/news/judge-michigan-lawmakers-must-turn-over-records-tesla-230249204.html?.tsrc=rss

links.title: Judge: Michigan lawmakers must turn over records to Tesla
links.description: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (AP) -- A federal judge has ruled two Michigan lawmakers must surrender to Tesla Motors Inc. records of their communications with lobbyists over a law barring the electric car maker from selling directly to customers. U.S. Magistrate Judge Ellen Carmody denied efforts by Republican Sen.

links.title: Tesla Model 3 to have best-in-class depreciation, report says
links.description: Tesla Chief Designer Franz von Holzhausen says that they designed the Model 3's interior to "age gracefully", which could actually help with its resale value in the long-term as cars are expected to change a lot in the next few years with the advent of self-driving and car-sharing.

links.title: 'Bull market check list remains intact' despite pullback, Morgan Stanley says
links.description: Investors may be feeling skeptical about the U.S. stock market right now, given indexes have dropped for two straight weeks-four, in the case of the Nasdaq-and there are few obvious positive catalysts in an environment where geopolitical uncertainty remains high and expectations for profit growth have been dropping.
